title: Trump, Mamdani meet again in unannounced DC visit
shortDescription: Mamdani’s public schedule, released late Feb. 25, didn’t include any public events. Mamdani wasn’t on the White House’s official schedule.

title: US judge won't block ongoing Trump White House ballroom construction
shortDescription: Judge Richard J. Leon's ruling came after the National Trust for Historic Preservation filed a lawsuit against Trump and several federal agencies.

title: What did Trump say about US women's hockey team White House invite?
shortDescription: President Donald Trump called the U.S. men's hockey team after they won the Olympic gold against Canada. His joke about the women's team went viral.

title: See images of former President Bill Clinton in Epstein files
shortDescription: Bill and Hillary Clinton have agreed to give depositions to a House committee about accused late sex trafficker Jeffrey Epstein.

title: FBI obtained Kash Patel, Susie Wiles phone records in Trump probe
shortDescription: FBI subpoenaed phone calls of Kash Patel and Susie Wiles, now FBI director and Trump Chief of Staff, when both were private citizens, Patel says.

title: Thousands of truckers, targeted by Trump, could lose licenses
shortDescription: Hundreds of thousands of truckers could be removed from American roads under the Trump administration's newly aggressive enforcement and safety campaign.

title: Trump's third-country deportations are unlawful, federal judge rules
shortDescription: U.S. Judge Brian Murphy said the Department of Homeland Security must stop dropping immigrants in countries that aren't their own.

title: Thousands of truckers, targeted by Trump, could be removed from roads
shortDescription: Truckers are a key part of keeping the American economy moving, with about 3.5 million commercial driver's license holders nationwide.

title: Trump calls Cuba a 'failed nation' as oil embargo talks continue
shortDescription: President Donald Trump called Cuba a "failed nation" on Feb. 16, as an oil embargo further cripples the country's flights and airport operations.

title: Trump pushes 'SAVE America' voting overhaul. Why Dems oppose it
shortDescription: Asserting "cheating is rampant" in US elections, the president said in his State of the Union speech he wants strict voter ID laws and other checks.

title: Trump celebrated 'big success' cutting crime. Was he right?
shortDescription: President Donald Trump celebrated the decline in murder and the National Guard deployments at the State of Union. Here's what the data tells us.

title: Trump administration can't search WaPo reporter's devices, judge says
shortDescription: The judge compared allowing the government to search the devices to "leaving the government's fox in charge of the Washington Post's henhouse."
